title: Subcellular effects of imidazolium-based ionic liquids with varying anions on the marine bivalve Mytilus galloprovincialis
content:
Publication date: 30 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 16

Author(s): Matilde Vieira Sanches, Carlo Pretti, Andrea Mezzetta, Lorenzo Guazzelli, Alessia Cuccaro, Lucia De Marchi, Rosa Freitas, Matteo Oliva
